title: Ticket #6520: starter crashes on update if it doesn't know the version of the shadow
description: When the starter tries to send file transfer tcp statistics back to the shadow, it know the only shadows built since 8.5.8 can handle such updates. So, it uses the condor version object to only send them back to newer shadows. Apparently, with match authentication, in some cases the authenticated connection to the shadow doesn't have the version information.
